thread.section_title: Champs Elysees Plaza Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic boutique hotel - Review of Champs Elysees Plaza Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Phil G
title: Fantastic boutique hotel
text:
Staff was outstanding. Friendly and helpful. Nice gym and spa - especially for a hotel this size. We used restaurant, bar and meeting room - all met or exceeded expectations. Convenient (walking) to a number of exceptional restaurants
Room Tip: Seventh floor room is large and bright. Views of the Eiffel Tower. Very comfortable See more room tips
